name: Malachi Ezeabuchukwu
headerTaglineFour: Well-versed with React, Javascript, Wordpress, Next13, Nodejs, Mongodb...

projects.title: DMoonTradeBot
projects.description: Python, SolonaaRPC, Railway, sqlite3, flask, cryptography, Telegram, Jupiter API. DMoonTradeBot is a secure and fully asynchronous Telegram-based trading assistant built on the Solana blockchain. It enables users to monitor balances, set trading targets, and execute transactions using encrypted wallets. The bot integrates the Solana RPC, Jupiter API, and real-time rate-limiting to ensure both performance and user safety.

projects.title: Banking App Demo
projects.description: Mongodb, Postman, React, Javascript. Boardman Bets is a sleek, user-centric sports betting platform designed for modern punters. Featuring a clean, intuitive interface, it allows users to manage their betting wallet, track deposits, withdrawals, and transaction history.

Assisted in the integration of third-party APIs and services to enhance application functionality, Built core frontend  functionalities that allowed for proper role management, user activities and state management, Developed dynamic routing for every type of user, Created backend functionalities for users to perform CRUD activities on the site, Achieved a 25% reduction in page load times through performance optimization techniques, Participated in sprint planning meetings and daily stand-ups to track progress and prioritize tasks
